title: Easy (Like Sunday Morning)
lyrics:
[intro] | (C)  (G) | (Dm) (Dm) | (x2)
 
(C) I know it sounds (G)funny but I just can't (Dm)stand the pain
(C) Girl I'm (G)leaving you tomor-(Dm)row
(C) Seems to (G)me girl, you know I've done (Dm)all I can
(C) You see I (G)begged, stole… and I (Dm)borrowed
 
[chorus]
Yeah (Dm) ooh,
That's why I'm (C)easy (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
I'm easy like Sunday (C)morning (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
That's why I'm (C)eaaaasyyyy (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
I'm easy like Sunday (Bb)mo-o-(F)o-o-(G)or(C)ning
 
(C) Why in the (G)world would anybody put (Dm)chains on me?
(C) I've (G)paid my dues to make (Dm)it
(C) Everybody (G)wants me to be what they (Dm)want me to be
(C) I'm not (G)happy when I try to (Dm)fake it
 
[chorus]
No (Dm) ooh,
That's why I'm (C)easy (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
I'm easy like Sunday (C)morning (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
That's why I'm (C)eaaaasyyyy (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
I'm easy like Sunday (Bb)mo-o-(F)o-o-(G)or(C)ning
 
[bridge]
I wanna be (Dm)high, so (Bb)high
I wanna be (Dm)free to know the things I do are (Bb)right
I wanna be (Dm)free… just (Bb)me, babe!
(Gm) (F) (Gm) (F-stop) oooh!
 
[interlude, kazoo] | (C)  (G) | (Dm) (Dm) | (x4)
 
[chorus]
That's why I'm (C)easy (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
I'm easy like Sunday (C)morning (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
That's why I'm (C)eaaaasyyyy (aaah (G)aah aah (Dm)aah)
I'm easy like Sunday [slow down] (Bb)mo-o-(F)o-o-(G)or(C)ning [end]
